org.daisy.pipeline.client.http

Class Pipeline2HttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.client.http.Pipeline2HttpClient

  • public class Pipeline2HttpClient
extends Object
    Implementation of DP2HttpClient that uses Apache HTTP Client as the underlying HTTP client.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static WSResponse get(String endpoint,
                             String path,
                             String username,
                             String secret,
                             Map<String,String> parameters)
                      throws Pipeline2Exception
        Send a GET request.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - WS endpoint, for instance "http://localhost:8182/ws".
        path - Path to resource, for instance "/scripts".
        username - Robot username. Can be null. If null, then the URL will not be signed.
        secret - Robot secret. Can be null.
        parameters - URL query string parameters
        Returns:
        The return body.
        Throws:
        Pipeline2Exception - thrown if an error occurs

      • delete

        public static WSResponse delete(String endpoint,
                                String path,
                                String username,
                                String secret,
                                Map<String,String> parameters)
                         throws Pipeline2Exception
        Send a DELETE request.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - WS endpoint, for instance "http://localhost:8182/ws".
        path - Path to resource, for instance "/scripts".
        username - Robot username. Can be null. If null, then the URL will not be signed.
        secret - Robot secret. Can be null.
        parameters - URL query string parameters
        Returns:
        The return body.
        Throws:
        Pipeline2Exception - thrown if an error occurs

      • postXml

        public static WSResponse postXml(String endpoint,
                                 String path,
                                 String username,
                                 String secret,
                                 Document xml)
                          throws Pipeline2Exception
        POST an XML document.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - WS endpoint, for instance "http://localhost:8182/ws".
        path - Path to resource, for instance "/scripts".
        username - Robot username. Can be null. If null, then the URL will not be signed.
        secret - Robot secret. Can be null.
        xml - The XML document to post.
        Returns:
        The return body.
        Throws:
        Pipeline2Exception - thrown if an error occurs

      • postMultipart

        public static WSResponse postMultipart(String endpoint,
                                       String path,
                                       String username,
                                       String secret,
                                       Map<String,File> parts)
                                throws Pipeline2Exception
        POST a multipart request.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - WS endpoint, for instance "http://localhost:8182/ws".
        path - Path to resource, for instance "/scripts".
        username - Robot username. Can be null. If null, then the URL will not be signed.
        secret - Robot secret. Can be null.
        parts - A map of all the parts.
        Returns:
        The return body.
        Throws:
        Pipeline2Exception - thrown if an error occurs

      • url

        public static String url(String endpoint,
                         String path,
                         String username,
                         String secret,
                         Map<String,String> parameters)
                  throws Pipeline2Exception
        Sign a URL for communication with a Pipeline 2 Web Service running in authenticated mode.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the Pipeline 2 endpoint
        path - the URL path component
        username - the username
        secret - the secret
        parameters - a map of parameters to encode in the URL
        Returns:
        the signed URL as a String
        Throws:
        Pipeline2Exception - thrown if an error occurs
